main event: A woman in Arkansas reported seeing a bright, flashing object in the sky that appeared to move behind a cloud and disappear for a period of time.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2 hours and 25 minutes.
The object appeared to stand still at times and then suddenly speed up and rush away.
The witness described the object as being as bright as a flashing spotlight in the sky.
The witness was able to estimate the object's distance as being 1-2 miles away.
The witness drew a sketch depicting an elongated, saucer-shaped object with a vapor trail.
sighted object: a bright, flashing object in the sky
